page.title: 08A Twelve year old's Friday
page.content: {continued} People then just join in as they come out from dinner. After play it is games. For games we have rounders either in the hall, on the playground or on the field. We play rounders until around 2.15 p.m. Once everybody has changed we usually watch a video until 3.10 p.m. when the whistle goes for the bus. When I get home I have a drink and usually watch T.V. until my tea at about 5.45 p.m. After tea I have to feed our pets, Smokey the rabbit and Pepper the guinea pig.I lock them up for the night and either play cricket with the other boys in the village, play on the computer or watch T.V. Finally I go to bed and read after a long day.
